comments:
Clicking the Browse button on the Unique ID field of the Component details pane 
in the GLA editor results in an error message box being displayed and the 
Select Component window has no labels.  This happens with the 3.0 M8 version of 
GLA editor.  The following exception stack trace is written to the eclipse log:

in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".
